attributes.action: Support John Bercow to use his prerogative to stop the suspension of parliament
attributes.background: John Bercow as the speaker can use his power to hold parliament in exile against the prorogation. This would essentially be the only and best option to stop Boris Johnson's dictatorship of Brexit. Support Bercow to stop this hienious coup of democracy

rejection.details:
